title: Schedules

editor.addFirstItem: Add songs or slides to build your schedule

messages.importedWithSongs_other: Schedule imported with {{count}} new songs created

modal.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this schedule? This action cannot be undone.
modal.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
modal.addSongDescription: Select a schedule to add this song

export.formatDescription: Choose the format you want to export this schedule to.

churchprogram.name: Church Program
churchprogram.description: JSON format for importing into Church Hub. Preserves all schedule data and song slides.

pptx.name: PowerPoint Archive
pptx.description: ZIP file containing PPTX presentations for each song and a text file with the schedule overview.

noSchedulesDescription: Create your first schedule to plan your presentations

editAsText.title: Edit Schedule as Text
editAsText.description: Enter items using prefixes. Lines starting with # are comments.
editAsText.formatHelp:
# Format examples:
# S: Song Title
# A: Announcement text
# V: John 3:16 (Bible passage)
# VT: Person Name - John 3:16 (Youth verse)
